thumb.title: Grand Theft Auto VI / Vice City Pop 80s Part 2
thumb.description: ８０年代洋楽ポップ集です。グランド・セフト・オート６の為に厳選しました。全て過去のGTA作品のラジオで収録された事がない楽曲です。作業用BGMにでもどうぞ。楽曲リスト↓#0:00 Gloria Estefan - Rhythm Is Gonna Get You (1987)#4:02 Rockwell ft. Michael Jackson - Somebody's Watching Me (1983)#8:02 Donna Summer - She Works Hard For The Money (1983)#13:24 Irene Cara - Fame (1980)#18:41 Rick Springfield - Don't Talk to Strangers (1982)#21:42 Lindsey Buckingham - Go Insane (1984)#24:36 Oran Juice Jones - The Rain (1986)#29:49 Baltimora - Tarzan Boy (1985)#36:05 Madonna - La Isla Bonita (1987)#40:11 Spandau Ballet - Only When You Leave (1984)#45:22 Modern Talking - Cheri Cheri Lady (1985)#49:12 The Human League - Human (1986)#53:02 Johnny Hates Jazz - Shattered Dreams (1987)#56:31 ABC - The Look of Love (1982)#60:06 The Pointer Sisters - Hot Together (1986)Grand Theft Auto VI / Vice City Pop 80s Part 1→sm44969146
